text: The Flinstones (1960-1996) is regarded as the first primetime animated series, and it was themost successful until 'The Simpsons' came around in 1989.

The alternative rock band 311 is named for the police code for indecent exposure in Omaha, Nebraska. The name was chosen after the band's original guitarist was arrested for skinny dipping in a public pool.

front: Who is the best selling author of all time?

text: 60 Minutes was the first network TV show without theme music, if you don't cound the ticking clock.
